Key Match Events: Anthony Davis went down with an eye injury midway through the third quarter.
Jaxson Hayes replaced Anthony Davis with 5:16 left in the third quarter.
Jaxson Hayes executed a monster dunk with under three minutes left in the third quarter.
Jaxson Hayes ended the night playing 22 minutes, scoring 12 points and grabbing six rebounds.
Jaxson Hayes had the best plus-minus on the Lakers with a +21.
Los Angeles outscored the Raptors 70-48 in the second half.
Post-Match Reflections: Head coach JJ Redick discussed Hayes taking on a bigger responsibility in the game, praising his energy and impact.
Austin Reaves commented on Hayes' performance, calling it one of his best games and highlighting his defensive and scoring contributions.
